DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Walking Obese Pregnant Women Perinatal Outcomes - Multicenter Randomized Clinical Trial
DOC.criteria: Age 18 40 year ; Gestational age ≤ 20 week , calculate last menstrual period confirm first ultrasound scan ; Obesity body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 30 kg/m2 , base weight pregnancy , report pregnant woman 5 kg measure admission study ; Physically inactive accord International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAC ) ; Single pregnancy . Kidney disease collagen ; Previous history GDM ; Diabetes type 1 type 2 ; Hypertensive disorder related pregnancy ; Hemodynamic instability ; Vaginal bleeding ; Visual , auditory cognitive impairment .
